feature.name: Boolean Calculator Operations
feature.file:
Feature: Boolean Calculator Operations Scenario: Perform OR operation Given a boolean calculator When I OR true and false Then the result should be true
Scenario: Perform AND operation Given a boolean calculator When I AND true and false Then the result should be false
Scenario: Perform AND operation failed Given a boolean calculator When I AND true and false Then the result should be true

step.name: When I OR true and false
Then the result should be true
When I AND true and false
Then the result should be false
When I AND true and false
Then the result should be true

feature.name: Calculator Operations
feature.file:
Feature: Calculator Operations Scenario: Add two numbers Given a calculator When I add 5 and 3 Then the result should be 8
Scenario: Subtract two numbers Given a calculator When I subtract 5 from 10 Then the result should be 5
Scenario: Divide two numbers Given a calculator When I divide 10 by 2 Then the result should be 5
